attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2008-1829

Date: 2008-11-28

Sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, le Comité du Conseil privé recommande que Elizabeth Jollimore, de la ville de Halifax dans la province de la Nouvelle-Écosse, l'une des conseillères juridiques de Sa Majesté, soit nommée juge de la Cour suprême de la Nouvelle-Écosse (Division de la famille), et juge d'office de la Cour d'appel de la Nouvelle-Écosse.


The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advises that Elizabeth Jollimore, of the City of Halifax, in the Province of Nova Scotia, one of Her Majesty's Counsel learned in the law, be appointed a Judge of the Supreme Court of Nova Scotia (Family Division), and a Judge ex officio of the Nova Scotia Court of Appeal.

The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advises that Elizabeth Jollimore, of the City of Halifax, in the Province of Nova Scotia, one of Her Majesty's Counsel learned in the law, be appointed a Judge of the Supreme Court of Nova Scotia (Family Division), and a Judge ex officio of the Nova Scotia Court of Appeal.
